assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Attention is paid to the role of social context for child socialization, although earlier studies view social factors merely in light of cognitive development. The course offers an introduction to the research methods and results of studies into child's social development.
description.et: Suuremat tähelepanu pööratakse sotsiaalse keskkonna rollile lapse sotsiaalses arengus, kuna varasemates uuringutes on sotsiaalset arengut peamiselt individuaalse kognitiivse arenguga seostatud. Tutvustatakse lapse sotsiaalse arengu uurimiseks kasutatavaid meetodeid ja saadud tulemusi.

objectives.en: The course aims to give knowledge of children's social development and skills for its assessment and support.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda teadmisi lapse sotsiaalsest arengust ning oskusi selle hindamiseks ja toetamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has passed the course
- is able to explain the peculiarities of social development of children of various ages;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab selgitada, mis on eri vanuses laste sotsiaalsele arengule iseloomulikud jooned;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows and is able to analyze the role of different socializers in children's social development;
learning_outcomes.et: - teab ja oskab analüüsida erinevate sotsialiseerijate rolli lapse sotsiaalses arengus;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the application possibilities of different assessment methods;
- is able to study some aspect of social development.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab uurida mõnda sotsiaalse arengu aspekti.
